snippet.title: Order from Caos 2 Trailer
snippet.description:
Order from Caos 2 is a pixel art turn-based RPG, created and developed by Renan Barreto from the White Vortex studio, and tells the story of Thomas, a man who lost his family, murdered by a mysterious and cruel Knight of the Bratania Empire, known by the name of Asmodeus. Thomas embarks on a journey of revenge, vowing to destroy his most merciless enemy. However, there is one detail that could change everything, his family might’ve simply never existed at all. Haunted by both possible realities, Thomas needs to understand what is behind all this tragedy to define his future that intertwines with the future of all humanity, even if it is about him going to hell.

Order from Caos 2 has nothing to do with the events or characters shown in the first game in the series.


Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1918420/Order_from_Caos_2/
Site: https://whitevortex.com.br/orderfromcaos2/

#rpg #jrpg #orderfromcaos #orderfromcaos2 #whitevortex #whitevortexgames #steam #steamgame #pc #pcgaming #pixelart #indiegame
